TextView.android:text: Password Puzzler is an interactive Android puzzle game built to raise awareness of password schemas and their implications. The password schema project is headed by Dr. Santosh Vempala at Georgia Institiute of Technology and intends to eradicate the prevailing problems with current passwords and their vulnerabilities. This application also exemplifies the usability of the password schemas by demonstrating their strength by provididng users with variable schemas to experiment with. The goal is to get users to apply such schemas in their daily digital lives.
